article_title: Name Released Of Man Killed In Semi Collision Near Bridgewater
article_text:
Bridgewater, SD

South Dakota Highway Patrol has released the name of the man killed in a collision with a semi-truck near Bridgewater, SD Friday afternoon.

Twenty-eight-year-old Benjamin Tollefson of Parkston died when his truck crossed the center lane going westbound on SD Highway 42 and struck a semi-truck driven by 26-year-old Matthew Geidel.

Tollefson died of his injuries. Geidel was not hurt. Both men were wearing seatbelts. Authorities say the investigation of the incident is ongoing.
